archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Customer Product Service Elegilibility
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Description: Maintain a profile of the product and services for which the customer is eligible and any specific terms or other applicable considerations (supports relationship development and sales activity)
Control record: Product specifications (target customer/situation profiles), Product/service features and options (related to target/actual customer use), Customer Product/Service eligibility indicator (all products/services), Customer specific eligibility terms/requirements (all products/services), Customer current and historical usage/entitlement (all products/services), Customer details (reference data, product usage, behavioral insights)
